name: Recelo
description:
Recelo is a short horror game about a guy who breaks in the house of a deceased. Fear, shots and a mystery to solve.

This is the first game i made, it may have some bugs. Hope you like it ;)

Twitter:   @MiguelR_Gamedev

Softwares used: 

-Game engine:    Godot Engine.

-Graphics editors:    Grafx2 , Libresprite.

-Music:    LMMS , Deflemask.

Some sounds were downloaded from http://www.sonidosmp3gratis.com and edited in Audacity(audio editor).
